Wondrous Item (Necklace), (requires attunement)

A simple medallion, sometimes gifted to loved ones as a token of good luck. The materials and iconography on the medallion vary between cultures, but the most common variety features the image of a heart on both sides—on the front symbolically, and on the back anatomically.

While Attuned

Your maximum hit points increases by 1.
